result.eng: Now that the product exists, we must start marketing it.
result.ga: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíocht
result.orig: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíocht
result.html: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíochtNow that the product exists, we must start marketing it.
result.ponchtml: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caiṫfiḋ muid taḃairt faoin ṁargaíoċtNow that the product exists, we must start marketing it.

result.ga: Tosóidh muid ar a trí a chlog

result.ponchtml: Tosóiḋ muid ar a trí a ċlogWe'll start at three o'clock.

result.eng: We had difficulties at the start.

result.ponchtml: Ḃí deacraċtaí againn ag an túsWe had difficulties at the start.

result.ga: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniú

result.html: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniúWhen did the meeting start?

result.eng: I woke up with a start.
result.html: Dhúisigh mé de phreabI woke up with a start.
result.ponchtml: Ḋúisiġ mé de ṗreabI woke up with a start.

result.eng: At the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ga: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.orig: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile

result.ponchtml: I dtús na seaċtóidí ṫosaiġ daoine ag filleaḋ ar ais aḃaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.

result.html: Tosaigh ag an túsStart at the beginning.
result.ponchtml: Tosaiġ ag an túsStart at the beginning.

result.html: Tugaimis faoin obair anoisLet's start the work now.

result.eng: I start working at nine o'clock.

result.eng: What time do you start working?
